## Loading the data
```{r, include=FALSE}
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
load("individuals.rda") 
```

```{r}
library(individuals)
Women<-individuals %>%
  
  filter(cmte_id=="C00283432"| cmte_id=="C00530766") 
  filter(cmte_id == "C00473918"| 
         cmte_id == "C00530766",
         transaction_dt <= "11062012",
         entity_type == "IND")
         transaction_dt >= "01012012" & 
         transaction_dt <= "12312012"
         entity_type == "IND") 

Donations<- contributions %>%
  filter(cmte_id == "C00473918"| 
         cmte_id == "C00530766",
         transaction_type == "24E")

NativeAmerican <- individuals %>%
  filter(transaction_type == "11") %>%
  
  select(-amndt_ind, -rpt_type) %>%
  select( -transaction_pgi, -image_num) %>%
  select( -city, -state) %>%
  select( -zip_code, -employer) %>%
  select( -occupation, -other_id) %>%
  select( -tran_id, -file_num) %>% 
  select( -memo_cd, -memo_text, -sub_id) 

```
